instructions:
What is 'Spor'?

A brilliant logic game designed to keep your brain up and running.

What do I do with it?

In each level you will get a set of math exercises that are a combination of icons and numbers. You have to translate the icons to numbers to reach the correct answer.

How do I play it?

At the bottom of each level you will see a list of optional results. Clicking one of them will end the level., we wish you for success. :)

Are there any rules?

Yes! First, each icon is a unique number. Second, sometimes, you have to guess the result, as it cannot always be collected from the exercises.

How are the levels built?

The higher the level, the more numbers and fewer exercises. Note that speed is also taken into account.

Can I reach the last level of this wonderful game?

We don't think so, as the higher levels require mutant math skills, but who knows?

I very like this game, Can I contact you?

Of course, email us at sporgamemail@gmail.com

I like this game very much. Can I help you?

On the home screen, there is a 'Share' button. When you click on it, you can share the game with friends and let them know there is a new timewaster on the market.
